lines.text: Ah, it is morning, and all the trains are fast asleep. All except Casey's. His train is slow asleep.
[Casey's train is in collision course with another train]

[as conductor]
Hey, Casey, here comes a freight! I said here comes a freight!

[as Casey]
Don't worry mate. We wont be late.

[as conductor]
Egad! Look, look, look, look! Train, train, train!
If that's Casey, I'm a Rhode Island rooster.
[Casey rescues a damsel-in-distress tied to the railroad tracks]

[as mustache twirling villain]
Curses! Foiled again!
[Casey tosses the still bound damsel-in-distress to a railroad station attendant as his train speeds by]
